response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by its users for its exceptional quality and functionality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $200, which is significantly below its market value of $300. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that is worth more than what you're paying, making it a smart investment. I hope you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 200}
